$comment: Please do not edit this schema by hand. Generate it instead by running npm run build:schema.

type.description: the type of event recorded. Either WebScience.advertisements, WebScience.articleContents, WebScience.pageNav, or WebScience.pageNavSensitive

userId.description: a unique ID associated with a participant.

visitId.description: a unique ID associated with a page visit.

referrer.description: The page that referred the user to the current page

pageVisitStartTime.description: unix timestamp (in ms) of the page visit start

pageVisitStopTime.description: unix timestamp (in ms) of the page visit end. NOTE: this field will not necessarily represent the page visit stop time, just the largest time value at the time of the event creation. For a given page id, look for the largest value of pageVisitStopTime to get more accurate information.

attentionDuration.description: duration (in ms) that the page was in attentive view

audioDuration.description: duration (in ms) that audio was playing on the page

attentionAndAudioDuration.description: duration (in ms) that audio was playing on the page and the page was in attentive view

maxRelativeScrollDepth.description: The largest depth reach on the page, as a proportion of the total page height

url.description: The URL of the page visited
